content_sections.heading: uudised:
items: Zuga pälvis Hea Teatri Auhinnna 2021 - täname!!!
Zuga on välja tulnud oma liikumispausidega, mis on kättesaadavad STL-i kodulehel https://stl.ee/tootuba/liikumispausid/

extraction_notes: Lines 200-500 contain identical site-wide news content as all other pages examined. Part of adult performances section (lavastused suurtele). English version titled 'Noise' available at /english/noise. Differentiation through hero background and performance-specific images. Listed in navigation under 'lavastused suurtele' submenu as 'Müra'.
